channel.title: Cant Loggon my server with my client Got an error
channel.description:
if i try to logon my server my client dc's the second time i login i am dead and everything is gone and dc's but i cant play just black screen i can only see my inventory,
I get the error,
[Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection]
Can someone help me please.

item.title: Cant Loggon my server with my client Got an error
item.dc:creator: @bloodmaniet bloodmaniet
item.description:
@bloodmaniet wrote:

Many ppl have this problem what you probably need to do is run it using win.rar instead of right out of the client.

Read full topic
